property.name: hadoop.job.history.location
property.description: If job tracker is static the history files are stored in this single well known place.

property.name: hadoop.job.history.user.location
property.description: User can specify a location to store the history files of a particular job.

property.name: mapred.job.tracker.history.completed.location
property.description: The completed job history files are stored at this single well known location.

property.name: io.sort.factor
property.description: The number of streams to merge at once while sorting files.

property.name: io.sort.mb
property.description: The total amount of buffer memory to use while sorting files, in megabytes.

property.name: io.sort.record.percent
property.description: The percentage of io.sort.mb dedicated to tracking record boundaries.

property.name: io.sort.spill.percent
property.description: The soft limit in either the buffer or record collection buffers.

property.name: io.map.index.skip
property.description: Number of index entries to skip between each entry. Zero by default.

property.name: mapred.job.tracker
property.description: The host and port that the MapReduce job tracker runs at. If "local", then jobs are run in-process as a single map and reduce task.

property.name: mapred.job.tracker.http.address
property.description: The job tracker http server address and port the server will listen on. If the port is 0 then the server will start on a free port.

property.name: mapred.job.tracker.handler.count
property.description: The number of server threads for the JobTracker. This should be roughly 4% of the number of tasktracker nodes.

property.name: mapred.task.tracker.report.address
property.description: The interface and port that task tracker server listens on.

property.name: mapred.local.dir
property.description: The local directory where MapReduce stores intermediate data files.

property.name: mapred.system.dir
property.description: The directory where MapReduce stores control files.

property.name: mapreduce.jobtracker.staging.root.dir
property.description: The root of the staging area for users' job files

property.name: mapred.temp.dir
property.description: A shared directory for temporary files.

property.name: mapred.local.dir.minspacestart
property.description: If the space in mapred.local.dir drops under this, do not ask for more tasks. Value in bytes.

property.name: mapred.local.dir.minspacekill
property.description: If the space in mapred.local.dir drops under this, do not ask more tasks until all the current ones have finished and cleaned up.

property.name: local.cache.size
property.description: The number of bytes to allocate in each local TaskTracker directory for holding Distributed Cache data.

property.name: mapreduce.tasktracker.cache.local.numberdirectories
property.description: The maximum number of subdirectories that should be created in any particular distributed cache store.

property.name: mapred.tasktracker.expiry.interval
property.description: Expert: The time-interval, in miliseconds, after which a tasktracker is declared 'lost' if it doesn't send heartbeats.

property.name: mapred.tasktracker.instrumentation
property.description: Expert: The instrumentation class to associate with each TaskTracker.

property.name: mapred.tasktracker.resourcecalculatorplugin
property.description: Name of the class whose instance will be used to query resource information on the tasktracker.

property.name: mapred.tasktracker.taskmemorymanager.monitoring-interval
property.description: The interval, in milliseconds, for which the tasktracker waits between two cycles of monitoring its tasks' memory usage.

property.name: mapred.tasktracker.tasks.sleeptime-before-sigkill
property.description: The time, in milliseconds, the tasktracker waits for sending a SIGKILL to a process, after it has been sent a SIGTERM.

property.name: mapred.map.tasks
property.description: The default number of map tasks per job. Ignored when mapred.job.tracker is "local".

property.name: mapred.reduce.tasks
property.description: The default number of reduce tasks per job. Typically set to 99% of the cluster's reduce capacity

property.name: mapreduce.tasktracker.outofband.heartbeat
property.description: Expert: Set this to true to let the tasktracker send an out-of-band heartbeat on task-completion for better latency.

property.name: mapred.jobtracker.restart.recover
property.description: "true" to enable (job) recovery upon restart, "false" to start afresh

property.name: mapred.job.restart.recover
property.description: A per-job override for job recovery.

property.name: mapred.jobtracker.job.history.block.size
property.description: The block size of the job history file.

property.name: mapreduce.jobtracker.split.metainfo.maxsize
property.description: The maximum permissible size of the split metainfo file.

property.name: mapred.jobtracker.taskScheduler
property.description: The class responsible for scheduling the tasks.

property.name: mapred.jobtracker.taskScheduler.maxRunningTasksPerJob
property.description: The maximum number of running tasks for a job before it gets preempted. No limits if undefined.

property.name: mapred.map.max.attempts
property.description: Expert: The maximum number of attempts per map task.

property.name: mapred.reduce.max.attempts
property.description: Expert: The maximum number of attempts per reduce task.

property.name: mapred.reduce.parallel.copies
property.description: The default number of parallel transfers run by reduce during the copy(shuffle) phase.

property.name: mapreduce.reduce.shuffle.maxfetchfailures
property.description: The maximum number of times a reducer tries to fetch a map output before it reports it.

property.name: mapreduce.reduce.shuffle.connect.timeout
property.description: Expert: The maximum amount of time (in milli seconds) a reduce task spends in trying to connect to a tasktracker for getting map output.

property.name: mapreduce.reduce.shuffle.read.timeout
property.description: Expert: The maximum amount of time (in milli seconds) a reduce task waits for map output data to be available for reading after obtaining connection.

property.name: mapred.task.timeout
property.description: The number of milliseconds before a task will be terminated if it neither reads an input, writes an output, nor updates its status string.

property.name: mapred.tasktracker.map.tasks.maximum
property.description: The maximum number of map tasks that will be run simultaneously by a task tracker.

property.name: mapred.tasktracker.reduce.tasks.maximum
property.description: The maximum number of reduce tasks that will be run simultaneously by a task tracker.

property.name: mapred.jobtracker.completeuserjobs.maximum
property.description: The maximum number of complete jobs per user to keep around before delegating them to the job history.

property.name: mapreduce.reduce.input.limit
property.description: The limit on the input size of the reduce.

property.name: mapred.job.tracker.retiredjobs.cache.size
property.description: The number of retired job status to keep in the cache.

property.name: mapred.job.tracker.jobhistory.lru.cache.size
property.description: The number of job history files loaded in memory.

property.name: mapred.jobtracker.instrumentation
property.description: Expert: The instrumentation class to associate with each JobTracker.

property.name: mapred.jobtracker.plugins
property.description: Comma-separated list of jobtracker plug-ins to be activated.

property.name: mapred.child.java.opts
property.description: Java opts for the task tracker child processes.

property.name: mapred.child.env
property.description: User added environment variables for the task tracker child processes.

property.name: mapred.child.ulimit
property.description: The maximum virtual memory, in KB, of a process launched by the Map-Reduce framework.

property.name: mapred.cluster.map.memory.mb
property.description: The size, in terms of virtual memory, of a single map slot in the Map-Reduce framework, used by the scheduler.

property.name: mapred.cluster.reduce.memory.mb
property.description: The size, in terms of virtual memory, of a single reduce slot in the Map-Reduce framework, used by the scheduler.

property.name: mapred.cluster.max.map.memory.mb
property.description: The maximum size, in terms of virtual memory, of a single map task launched by the Map-Reduce framework, used by the scheduler.

property.name: mapred.cluster.max.reduce.memory.mb
property.description: The maximum size, in terms of virtual memory, of a single reduce task launched by the Map-Reduce framework, used by the scheduler.

property.name: mapred.job.map.memory.mb
property.description: The size, in terms of virtual memory, of a single map task for the job.

property.name: mapred.job.reduce.memory.mb
property.description: The size, in terms of virtual memory, of a single reduce task for the job.

property.name: mapred.child.tmp
property.description: To set the value of tmp directory for map and reduce tasks.

property.name: mapred.map.child.log.level
property.description: The logging level for the map task. The allowed levels are: OFF, FATAL, ERROR, WARN, INFO, DEBUG, TRACE and ALL.

property.name: mapred.reduce.child.log.level
property.description: The logging level for the reduce task. The allowed levels are: OFF, FATAL, ERROR, WARN, INFO, DEBUG, TRACE and ALL.

property.name: mapred.inmem.merge.threshold
property.description: The threshold, in terms of the number of files for the in-memory merge process.

property.name: mapred.job.shuffle.merge.percent
property.description: The usage threshold at which an in-memory merge will be initiated

property.name: mapred.job.shuffle.input.buffer.percent
property.description: The percentage of memory to be allocated from the maximum heap size to storing map outputs during the shuffle.

property.name: mapred.job.reduce.input.buffer.percent
property.description: The percentage of memory- relative to the maximum heap size- to retain map outputs during the reduce.

property.name: mapred.map.tasks.speculative.execution
property.description: If true, then multiple instances of some map tasks may be executed in parallel.

property.name: mapred.reduce.tasks.speculative.execution
property.description: If true, then multiple instances of some reduce tasks may be executed in parallel.

property.name: mapred.job.reuse.jvm.num.tasks
property.description: How many tasks to run per jvm. If set to -1, there is no limit.

property.name: mapred.min.split.size
property.description: The minimum size chunk that map input should be split into.

property.name: mapred.jobtracker.maxtasks.per.job
property.description: The maximum number of tasks for a single job. A value of -1 indicates that there is no maximum.

property.name: mapred.submit.replication
property.description: The replication level for submitted job files. This should be around the square root of the number of nodes.

property.name: mapred.tasktracker.dns.interface
property.description: The name of the Network Interface from which a task tracker should report its IP address.

property.name: mapred.tasktracker.dns.nameserver
property.description: The host name or IP address of the name server (DNS)

property.name: tasktracker.http.threads
property.description: The number of worker threads that for the http server. This is used for map output fetching

property.name: mapred.task.tracker.http.address
property.description: The task tracker http server address and port. If the port is 0 then the server will start on a free port.

property.name: keep.failed.task.files
property.description: Should the files for failed tasks be kept.

property.name: mapred.output.compress
property.description: Should the job outputs be compressed?

property.name: mapred.output.compression.type
property.description: If the job outputs are to compressed as SequenceFiles, how should they be compressed? Should be one of NONE, RECORD or BLOCK.

property.name: mapred.output.compression.codec
property.description: If the job outputs are compressed, how should they be compressed?

property.name: mapred.compress.map.output
property.description: Should the outputs of the maps be compressed before being sent across the network. Uses SequenceFile compression.

property.name: mapred.map.output.compression.codec
property.description: If the map outputs are compressed, how should they be compressed?

property.name: map.sort.class
property.description: The default sort class for sorting keys.

property.name: mapred.userlog.limit.kb
property.description: The maximum size of user-logs of each task in KB. 0 disables the cap.

property.name: mapred.userlog.retain.hours
property.description: The maximum time, in hours, for which the user-logs are to be retained after the job completion.

property.name: mapred.user.jobconf.limit
property.description: The maximum allowed size of the user jobconf. The default is set to 5 MB

property.name: mapred.hosts
property.description: Names a file that contains the list of nodes that may connect to the jobtracker. If the value is empty, all hosts are permitted.

property.name: mapred.hosts.exclude
property.description: Names a file that contains the list of hosts that should be excluded by the jobtracker.

property.name: mapred.heartbeats.in.second
property.description: Expert: Approximate number of heart-beats that could arrive at JobTracker in a second.

property.name: mapred.max.tracker.blacklists
property.description: The number of blacklists for a taskTracker by various jobs after which the task tracker could be blacklisted across all jobs.

property.name: mapred.max.tracker.failures
property.description: The number of task-failures on a tasktracker of a given job after which new tasks of that job aren't assigned to it.

property.name: jobclient.output.filter
property.description: The filter for controlling the output of the task's userlogs sent to the console of the JobClient.

property.name: jobclient.completion.poll.interval
property.description: The interval (in milliseconds) between which the JobClient polls the JobTracker for updates about job status.

property.name: jobclient.progress.monitor.poll.interval
property.description: The interval (in milliseconds) between which the JobClient reports status to the console and checks for job completion.

property.name: mapred.job.tracker.persist.jobstatus.active
property.description: Indicates if persistency of job status information is active or not.

property.name: mapred.job.tracker.persist.jobstatus.hours
property.description: The number of hours job status information is persisted in DFS.

property.name: mapred.job.tracker.persist.jobstatus.dir
property.description: The directory where the job status information is persisted in a file system to be available after it drops of the memory queue and between jobtracker restarts.

property.name: mapreduce.job.complete.cancel.delegation.tokens
property.description: if false - do not unregister/cancel delegation tokens from renewal, because same tokens may be used by spawned jobs

property.name: mapred.task.profile
property.description: The information is stored in the user log directory. The value is "true" if task profiling is enabled.

property.name: mapred.task.profile.maps
property.description: To set the ranges of map tasks to profile. mapred.task.profile has to be set to true for the value to be accounted.

property.name: mapred.task.profile.reduces
property.description: To set the ranges of reduce tasks to profile. mapred.task.profile has to be set to true for the value to be accounted.

property.name: mapred.line.input.format.linespermap
property.description: Number of lines per split in NLineInputFormat.

property.name: mapred.skip.attempts.to.start.skipping
property.description: The number of Task attempts AFTER which skip mode will be kicked off.

property.name: mapred.skip.map.auto.incr.proc.count
property.description: The flag which if set to true, SkipBadRecords.COUNTER_MAP_PROCESSED_RECORDS is incremented by MapRunner after invoking the map function.

property.name: mapred.skip.reduce.auto.incr.proc.count
property.description: The flag which if set to true, SkipBadRecords.COUNTER_REDUCE_PROCESSED_GROUPS is incremented by framework after invoking the reduce function.

property.name: mapred.skip.out.dir
property.description: If no value is specified here, the skipped records are written to the output directory at _logs/skip.

property.name: mapred.skip.map.max.skip.records
property.description: The number of acceptable skip records surrounding the bad record PER bad record in mapper.

property.name: mapred.skip.reduce.max.skip.groups
property.description: The number of acceptable skip groups surrounding the bad group PER bad group in reducer.

property.name: mapreduce.ifile.readahead
property.description: Configuration key to enable/disable IFile readahead.

property.name: mapreduce.ifile.readahead.bytes
property.description: Configuration key to set the IFile readahead length in bytes.

property.name: job.end.retry.attempts
property.description: Indicates how many times hadoop should attempt to contact the notification URL

property.name: job.end.retry.interval
property.description: Indicates time in milliseconds between notification URL retry calls

property.name: hadoop.rpc.socket.factory.class.JobSubmissionProtocol
property.description: SocketFactory to use to connect to a Map/Reduce master (JobTracker). If null or empty, then use hadoop.rpc.socket.class.default.

property.name: mapred.task.cache.levels
property.description: This is the max level of the task cache. For example, if the level is 2, the tasks cached are at the host level and at the rack level.

property.name: mapred.queue.names
property.description: Comma separated list of queues configured for this jobtracker.

property.name: mapred.acls.enabled
property.description: Specifies whether ACLs should be checked for authorization of users for doing various queue and job level operations.

property.name: mapred.queue.default.state
property.description: This values defines the state , default queue is in.

property.name: mapred.job.queue.name
property.description: Queue to which a job is submitted.

property.name: mapreduce.job.acl-modify-job
property.description: Job specific access-control list for 'modifying' the job.

property.name: mapreduce.job.acl-view-job
property.description: Job specific access-control list for 'viewing' the job.

property.name: mapred.tasktracker.indexcache.mb
property.description: The maximum memory that a task tracker allows for the index cache that is used when serving map outputs to reducers.

property.name: mapred.merge.recordsBeforeProgress
property.description: The number of records to process during merge before sending a progress notification to the TaskTracker.

property.name: mapred.reduce.slowstart.completed.maps
property.description: Fraction of the number of maps in the job which should be complete before reduces are scheduled for the job.

property.name: mapred.task.tracker.task-controller
property.description: TaskController which is used to launch and manage task execution

property.name: mapreduce.tasktracker.group
property.description: Expert: Group to which TaskTracker belongs.

property.name: mapred.disk.healthChecker.interval
property.description: How often the TaskTracker checks the health of its local directories.

property.name: mapred.healthChecker.script.path
property.description: Absolute path to the script which is periodicallyrun by the node health monitoring service to determine if the node is healthy or not.

property.name: mapred.healthChecker.interval
property.description: Frequency of the node health script to be run, in milliseconds

property.name: mapred.healthChecker.script.timeout
property.description: Time after node health script should be killed if unresponsive and considered that the script has failed.

property.name: mapred.healthChecker.script.args
property.description: List of arguments which are to be passed to node health script when it is being launched comma seperated.

property.name: mapreduce.shuffle.ssl.enabled
property.description: Whether to use SSL for for the Shuffle HTTP endpoints.

property.name: mapreduce.shuffle.ssl.address
property.description: IP Address to bind the SSL Shuffle endpoint.

property.name: mapreduce.shuffle.ssl.port
property.description: Port to bind the SSL Shuffle endpoint.

property.name: mapreduce.job.map.output.collector.class
property.description: It defines the MapOutputCollector implementation to use.

property.name: mapreduce.job.reduce.shuffle.consumer.plugin.class
property.description: It defines the ShuffleConsumerPlugin implementation to use.
